name: Notion
description: Connect to Notion workspaces to search pages, read content, create and update pages, and manage databases. Enables AI-powered interaction with your Notion knowledge base and project documentation.

inputs.label: Notion API Key
inputs.description: Notion internal integration token. Create an integration in Notion's developer portal and share relevant pages/databases with it.

obtain.instructions: Go to https://www.notion.so/my-integrations, click 'New integration', give it a name, select your workspace, and copy the Internal Integration Token. Then share relevant Notion pages with your integration.

auth.instructions: Requires a Notion Internal Integration Token. Create one at https://www.notion.so/my-integrations. Remember to share relevant pages and databases with the integration.
